img.title: Delivering animal vaccines via app
img.alt: Delivering animal vaccines via app

div.h2: Delivering animal vaccines via app 04.05.2022
div.p: Many Ghanaian farmers lose their animals due to inadequate vaccination. But now, a startup created by two youngers is solving the problem. The Cowtribe mobile app delivers the last-mile vaccines to livestock ranchers.

img.title: Open letter about weapons deliveries to Ukraine draws criticism
img.alt: Open letter about weapons deliveries to Ukraine draws criticism

div.h2: Open letter about weapons deliveries to Ukraine draws criticism 04.05.2022
div.p: The publication of an open letter to German Chancellor Scholz signed by leading cultural figures has triggered a fierce debate about the planned delivery of heavy weapons to Ukraine — especially on social media.

img.title: German Overshoot Day: 'We cannot continue like this'
img.alt: German Overshoot Day: 'We cannot continue like this'

div.h2: German Overshoot Day: 'We cannot continue like this' 04.05.2022
div.p: Germany has used more resources in the first third of 2022 than are sustainably available to it for an entire year. Here's what needs to change.

img.title: Can Algeria contribute to EU's energy security?
img.alt: Can Algeria contribute to EU's energy security?

div.h2: Can Algeria contribute to EU's energy security? 04.05.2022
div.p: Timely decisions, long-term commitments and a broader vision could help the European Union increase ties with the Western Mediterranean. Algeria, with its large reserves, could enhance the bloc's energy security.

img.title: DOK.fest Munich puts spotlight on Ukraine
img.alt: DOK.fest Munich puts spotlight on Ukraine

div.h2: DOK.fest Munich puts spotlight on Ukraine 04.05.2022
div.p: After a two-year break due to the pandemic, the documentary film festival is once again held in cinemas. A political thriller about Alexei Navalny opens the event.

img.title: EU Commission calls for new sanctions on Russia
img.alt: EU Commission calls for new sanctions on Russia

div.h2: EU Commission calls for new sanctions on Russia 04.05.2022
div.p: The president of the European Commission outlined a new round of sanctions on Russia, including plans to ban oil imports. The new measures will also target a top bank and Russian broadcasters.

img.title: Locals and tourists bustle around Riga's old town center
img.alt: Locals and tourists bustle around Riga's old town center

div.h2: Exploring Eastern Europe: Latvia 04.05.2022
div.p: With a war raging in Ukraine, holidaymakers are wary of visiting central and Eastern Europe. But many countries are perfectly safe to visit, such as Latvia.

img.title: Roe v. Wade abortion rights protests follow US Supreme Court leak
img.alt: Roe v. Wade abortion rights protests follow US Supreme Court leak

div.h2: Roe v. Wade abortion rights protests follow US Supreme Court leak 04.05.2022
div.p: Rallies were held in cities across the United States after a leaked draft opinion suggested that the Supreme Court will overturn the ruling that legalized abortion in the country.

img.title: North Korea fires ballistic missile amid rising concerns over tests
img.alt: North Korea fires ballistic missile amid rising concerns over tests

div.h2: North Korea fires ballistic missile amid rising concerns over tests 04.05.2022
div.p: North Korea has been ramping up its weapons tests this year, defying sanctions and prompting warnings that Pyongyang could be preparing to resume nuclear tests.

img.title: EU Commission proposes ban on Russian oil — live updates
img.alt: EU Commission proposes ban on Russian oil — live updates

div.h2: EU Commission proposes ban on Russian oil — live updates 04.05.2022
div.p: The European Union has announced a new sanctions package against Russia, including an embargo on Russian oil. The sanctions also reportedly target the head of the Russian Orthodox Church. Follow DW for the latest.

img.title: 'It feels like the first': Jürgen Klopp into third Champions League final with Liverpool
img.alt: 'It feels like the first': Jürgen Klopp into third Champions League final with Liverpool

div.h2: 'It feels like the first': Jürgen Klopp into third Champions League final with Liverpool 03.05.2022
div.p: Liverpool stage a second half comeback against Villarreal to secure their place in the Champions League final. Coach Jürgen Klopp was relishing in his third final in five years, as Manchester City or Real Madrid await.

img.title: DW Business - America
img.alt: DW Business - America

div.h2: DW Business - America 03.05.2022
div.p: Lightspeed LNG - Europe's Largest Gas Field

img.title: Will buying cars online really take off?
img.alt: Will buying cars online really take off?

div.h2: Will buying cars online really take off? 03.05.2022
div.p: Boosted by the popularity of electric automaker Tesla, more people than ever are buying vehicles online. UBS estimates the web will make up half of all car sales by 2030, but what will that mean for traditional dealers?

img.title: BP logs high quarterly profit
img.alt: BP logs high quarterly profit

div.h2: BP logs high quarterly profit 03.05.2022
div.p: Oil and gas company BP has reported its highest quarterly profit in more than a decade thanks to surging energy prices. Spencer Welch takes a look at the highly volatile oil and gas market.

img.title: Naftogaz CEO praises EU effort to decrease Russian oil and gas imports
img.alt: Naftogaz CEO praises EU effort to decrease Russian oil and gas imports

div.h2: Naftogaz CEO praises EU effort to decrease Russian oil and gas imports 03.05.2022
div.p: The chief executive of Ukrainian state-owned Naftogaz, Yuriy Vitrenko, tells DW he's pleased the EU and Germany in particular are working to decrease dependency on Russian oil and gas and moving toward an oil embargo.

img.title: Sri Lanka's 'organic' move has failed
img.alt: Sri Lanka's 'organic' move has failed

div.h2: Sri Lanka's 'organic' move has failed 03.05.2022
div.p: When Sri Lanka banned chemical fertilizers a year and a half ago, the government said it was part of an effort to make the country a global leader in the production of organic food.. the real reason: to save money.

img.title: Opinion: Potential Supreme Court abortion decision shows callous disregard for women's lives
img.alt: Opinion: Potential Supreme Court abortion decision shows callous disregard for women's lives

div.h2: Opinion: Potential Supreme Court abortion decision shows callous disregard for women's lives 03.05.2022
div.p: A draft opinion reveals that the top US court plans to get rid of federal abortion rights, according to a report. Taking women's agency away like this is appalling and will lead to fatalities, writes DW's Carla Bleiker.

img.title: 'I am terrified for my future': leaked document on US abortion ruling galvanizes protesters
img.alt: 'I am terrified for my future': leaked document on US abortion ruling galvanizes protesters

div.h2: 'I am terrified for my future': leaked document on US abortion ruling galvanizes protesters 03.05.2022
div.p: The publication of a leaked document that could overturn a landmark abortion rights ruling in the US has sparked angry demonstrations in front of the Supreme Court. The decision would change a bedrock of American law.

img.title: Germany: Protesters demand answers from police over man's death
img.alt: Germany: Protesters demand answers from police over man's death

div.h2: Germany: Protesters demand answers from police over man's death 03.05.2022
div.p: The Mannheim public prosecutor's office is investigating two police officers for possible bodily harm resulting in death while on duty.

img.title: Argentina - Return of the jaguars
img.alt: Argentina - Return of the jaguars

div.h2: Argentina - Return of the jaguars 03.05.2022
div.p: For decades, jaguars were extinct in northern Argentina. Now, a major reintroduction program is bringing about their return. The aim? To restore the equilibrium of the ecosystem of the Esteros del Iberá wetlands.
